title: ADB okays $240.5 million loan for rooftop solar systems
description: The Asian Development Bank has approved $240.5 million in loans to support the expansion of rooftop solar systems in India. This financing will aid in achieving India's goal of 50% renewable energy by 2030 and contribute to the Surya Ghar program promoting rooftop solar installations nationwide.
